title: Pixel 4 & 4 XL slow function!!
content:
The response in both my devices are some time slow and stack, when i move from app to another app or to home screen or if I dial any number it takes notes slow function
Why Google?
The Google 3 & 3 XL with 4 GB of ram was better from the new one! What happened to google team and why you are not following the other smartphone speed and security!
